description: LA5742A prepares students for LA5742 (Dissertation) which is run in Semester 2 of the second year of MLA. LA5742 is a research-based module in which students undertake a research project on a topic of their choice under the supervision which culminates in a written dissertation report. LA5742A prepares students for this research undertaking by introducing students to research process, research methods and basic statistics. It is run in Semester 1 of the second year and culminates in the submission of a written dissertation proposal that students will execute for LA5742 in Semester 2.
title: Dissertation Preparation
